name: SATANIC PANIC
description:
The FOLLOWERS of SATAN have grown restless, impatiently awaiting judgement from their lord and saviour.

Meanwhile, Hell's population crisis has not slowed since the incursion of THE INTERNET. 

There is simply no room for more!

Much to Satan's dismay, his followers have decided to take matters into their own hands...

Navigate DEVILISH traps and puzzles to outwit Hell's finest and snow Satan under once and for all.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys for movement. R to restart the level.
